name: DOS Commands
summary: Get help for dos commands within VIM
description:
This will add all a online help for DOS commands (created from windows XP) to vim help system so you can find help for any dos commands by doing :help command

Example
:help FOR 

Note: all the dos commands are defined as uppercase, so use all uppercase when using help command.
install_details:
Just copy it to your vimfiles/doc folder and do :helptags command
see 
:help :helptags 
or
:help add-local-help 
for more info
